menuItems.name: Margherita Pizza
menuItems.description: Classic pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil, and olive oil.

menuItems.name: Pepperoni Pizza
menuItems.description: Traditional pizza topped with pepperoni slices and mozzarella cheese.

menuItems.name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
menuItems.description: Grilled chicken, BBQ sauce, red onions, and mozzarella cheese on a thin crust.

menuItems.name: Vegetarian Pizza
menuItems.description: Assorted vegetables, including bell peppers, mushrooms, onions, and olives, on a classic pizza base.

menuItems.name: Hawaiian Pizza
menuItems.description: A tropical twist with ham, pineapple chunks, and mozzarella cheese on a pizza crust.

menuItems.name: Cheeseburger
menuItems.description: Juicy beef patty topped with cheese, lettuce, tomato, and special sauce.

menuItems.name: Bacon Cheeseburger
menuItems.description: Delicious beef patty topped with crispy bacon, melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and mayo.

menuItems.name: Mushroom Swiss Burger
menuItems.description: Grilled beef patty with sautéed mushrooms, Swiss cheese, lettuce, and mayo.

menuItems.name: Spicy Jalapeno Burger
menuItems.description: Flame-grilled beef patty topped with spicy jalapenos, pepper jack cheese, lettuce, and chipotle mayo.

menuItems.name: Veggie Burger
menuItems.description: A delicious plant-based patty made with fresh vegetables, topped with lettuce, tomato, and vegan mayo.

menuItems.name: Grilled Salmon
menuItems.description: Freshly grilled salmon fillet served with roasted vegetables and lemon butter sauce.

menuItems.name: Shrimp Scampi
menuItems.description: Succulent shrimp sautéed in garlic, butter, white wine, and lemon juice, served with pasta.

menuItems.name: Crispy Fish Tacos
menuItems.description: Crispy fried fish fillets wrapped in warm tortillas, topped with slaw and tangy sauce.

menuItems.name: Lobster Ravioli
menuItems.description: Delicate ravioli filled with tender lobster meat, served in a creamy tomato sauce.

menuItems.name: Seafood Paella
menuItems.description: A classic Spanish rice dish with a medley of seafood including shrimp, mussels, and calamari.
